member.name: MIB_MFE_TABLE
member.summary: TheMIB_MFE_TABLE structure contains a table of Multicast Forwarding Entries (MFEs).

member.name: MIB_MFE_TABLE.dwNumEntries
member.summary: The number of MFEs in the table.

member.name: MIB_MFE_TABLE.table
member.summary: A pointer to a table of MFEs implemented as an array of structures.
